name: Angel Jump
description:
In this simple arcade style game, you can jump up platforms and not fall in to a pit of tentacles. Thats it! (nothing lewd here, you could even play at work!) 

Move left and right with the arrows or A and D

'enter' or 'space' to select and advance in the menus! 

You get one extra life, but be careful and get the high score!!

we hope you enjoy! 

follow us!! (NSFW 18+)
